short_summary: Electrical services for the Institut Maurice-Lamontagne in Mont-Joli, Quebec, Canada
description: The government of Canada is issuing a standing offer for the electrical services at the Institut Maurice-Lamontagne in Mont-Joli, Quebec, Canada. The standing offer will be used to provide electrical services at the Institut Maurice-Lamontagne and other related services. The member(s) selected under this agreement will be required to provide the electrical services as per the terms and conditions of the contract.
